channel.title: Server crashes need help
channel.description:
hey if anyone can could they help me fix this errors the dont happen all at one these are the ones that i have recorded [code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -9 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15668) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14628) at client.process(client.java:14598) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:47)
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:619) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:530) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:454) at server.main(server.java:48)
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3214 at client.dropItem(client.java:12840) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21728) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14629) at client.process(client.java:14599) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:47)
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:102) at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:615) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:530) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:454) at server.main(server.java:48)
java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15328) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14629) at client.process(client.java:14599) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:47)
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8580) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14626) at client.process(client.java:14599) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:47)
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:102) at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:653) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:530) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:454) at server.main(server.java:48)
[/code] if anyone could help me fix these i would be most thankful

item.title: Server crashes need help
item.dc:creator: @blobboy blobboy
item.description:
@blobboy wrote:

hey if anyone can could they help me fix this errors the dont happen all at one these are the ones that i have recorded

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -9
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15668)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:14628)
        at client.process(client.java:14598)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136)
        at server.main(server.java:47)




Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:619)
        at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:530)
        at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:454)
        at server.main(server.java:48)



java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3214
        at client.dropItem(client.java:12840)
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21728)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:14629)
        at client.process(client.java:14599)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136)
        at server.main(server.java:47)

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:102)
        at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94)
        at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:615)
        at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:530)
        at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:454)
        at server.main(server.java:48)


java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15328)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:14629)
        at client.process(client.java:14599)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136)
        at server.main(server.java:47)

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
        at client.fillInStream(client.java:8580)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:14626)
        at client.process(client.java:14599)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136)
        at server.main(server.java:47)

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:102)
        at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94)
        at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:653)
        at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:530)
        at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:454)
        at server.main(server.java:48)

if anyone could help me fix these i would be most thankful
